meanings.definition: The tenderest part of a loin of beef or pork.
meanings.sent1: The chef carefully seasoned the tenderloin before roasting it.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a juicy tenderloin steak for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The tenderloin was so tender, it practically melted in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the tenderloin in the tough world of business.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling tenderloin filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A district of a city marked by poverty and crime.
meanings.sent1: The police increased patrols in the tenderloin to reduce crime.
meanings.sent2: Many social programs aim to uplift residents of the tenderloin.
meanings.sent3: In the movie, the detective solved a case in the tenderloin with humor.
meanings.sent4: The tenderloin of the city was a hotbed of illicit activities.
meanings.sent5: The tenderloin bustled with activity, both good and bad.
